entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 10.8°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 8.1°C
Wind: SSW 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
